description: NetEase Meeting SDK - Comprehensive guides for integrating video conferencing capabilities into your applications across multiple platforms (Android/iOS/Web/H5/Windows/macOS/Linux/Electron)
rules: NEMeeting SDK supports 8 platforms: Android, iOS, Web, H5, Windows, macOS, Linux, and Electron
Each platform has its own integration guide under guides/[Platform]/ directory with consistent structure
For beginners: Start with Quick Start guides at guides/[Platform]/快速开始/ which include: 快速跑通 Sample Code.md, 集成并初始化 SDK.md (or 集成并初始化SDK.md for H5), and 登录鉴权.md
Meeting Management (会议管理/) includes: 创建会议.md, 加入会议.md, 预约会议.md, 邀请入会.md, 会议管理.md (member join/leave, leave/end meeting), and 会议状态变更流程.md
Meeting Security (会议安全/) includes: 概述.md, 会中水印.md, 入会音视频状态控制.md, and 媒体流加密.md (or 流媒体加密.md for iOS)
UI Customization (界面定制/) includes: 概述.md, 设置语言&主题.md (theme switching, language settings), 自定义菜单.md, and 其他界面定制.md (or 其他界面设置.md for Web)

Advanced features include: 基础美颜.md (beauty filters), 虚拟背景.md (virtual backgrounds), 会议扩展性.md (meeting extensions), 复用 IM 账号.md (IM account integration for Android/iOS/H5/Web), and 私有云配置.md (private cloud)
Platform-specific features: iOS has 屏幕共享.md (screen sharing), Web has 会议巡检.md (meeting inspection)
Troubleshooting (常见问题/) includes platform-specific FAQs: 会议安全.md (all platforms), 依赖冲突.md (Android/iOS), 功能版本对照.md (Android/iOS/Electron), 集成编译打包.md (Electron)
Each platform also includes: 更新日志.md (changelog) and 集成概述.md (integration overview)
Platform features and APIs may vary slightly - refer to platform-specific documentation
For production use, implement proper error handling and state management
Complete API reference documentation is available in api-reference/ directory
